r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - Fix #81490 ZipArchive::extractTo() may leak memory. (cmb, Remi) - Fix #77978 Dirname ending in colon unzips to wrong dir. (cmb) - add ZipArchive::clearError() method (Remi) - add ZipArchive::getStreamName() and ZipArchive::getStreamIndex methods (Remi)
